definitions.definition: Sharp , good-humoured , playful , typically spontaneous conversation .

Good-humoured bits of monologue and/or conversational prompts used in any of a wide range of occupations that must frequently interact with the public (for example, store clerks , salespersons , nurses ).

main_definition: Sharp , good-humoured , playful , typically spontaneous conversation .
secondary_definitions: Good-humoured bits of monologue and/or conversational prompts used in any of a wide range of occupations that must frequently interact with the public (for example, store clerks , salespersons , nurses ).
